attributes.title: Tiny Cars, Big Moves | Heat: Pedal to the Metal
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll, we race for pinks in Heat: Petal to the Metal! A strategy racing game that's all about managing your speed to outmaneuver your competitors. Too slow, and you'll be left in the dust. Too fast at a turn, and you crash!

attributes.title: Weird Products You Can Sell to a Cab Driver | Snake Oil
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll, we're playing Snake Oil! A game where our players will personify specific types of customers while the others try to sell them some real wild (west) stuff. I'm talking like real wild stuff like a Baby Sermon, or the classic Hallucination Drug, or even a Rock Ornament. I know...I'm also wanting to buy all of these things just reading this.

attributes.title: We Escape the Plague in 2023 | Bristol 1350
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll, it's half social deduction, half race, and all chaos in Bristol 1350! Players must escape the plague-infested city while trying to not get infected themselves. But with special guest Armando Torres from Funhaus, that may not be so easy!

attributes.title: The Board Game You Play Blindfolded? - When I Dream
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we are playing When I Dream!  Join Alfredo, BK, Ky, Jack, Trevor, Larry, and Wizard Larry as we give each other one word clues about our dreams.
attributes.description: This week on Let's Roll we are playing When I Dream!  Join Alfredo, BK, Ky, Jack, Trevor, Larry, and Wizard Larry as we give each other one word clues about our dreams.  Dreamers must guess each clue and try to put the pieces back together once they wake up in a short story.  Will the dreamers remember what happened while asleep or will the secret sandman and boogeyman throw them off the clue?
attributes.display_title: The Board Game You Play Blindfolded? - When I Dream

attributes.title: WTF is WLTDO? - Culture Tags - Let's Roll w/STF
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we are playing Culture Tags with STF.  In this game Ky, Trevor, Lindsay, Griff, Blizz, and Gus will divide into two teams.  Each team will have 90 seconds to guess what the acronym on each card stands for.  Only one player will be able to see the meaning on each card and give clues to teammates in order to decipher the phrase.  Hey do you wanna see what this description would look like if it was on a card?  TWOLRWAPCTWSTF.  ITGKTLGBAGWDITT. ETWHNSTGWTAOECSF.  OOPWBATSTMOECAGCLTTOPTDTP. HDYWSWTDWLLIIWOAC?

attributes.title: Gambling Like Dwarves | let's Roll: Quartz
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll, we dig too greedily and WAY too deep in Quartz. In this push-your-luck game about dwarves mining for precious gems, it's a gamble every day. Will someone strike it rich and be the King under the mountain, or end up with nothing but a broken pickaxe?

attributes.title: This Role-Swapping Game Has Us ALL Confused  - Mascarade - Let's Roll
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we are playing Mascarade!  In Mascarade players need to keep track of their role and its abilities to gain 13 coins before anyone else does.
attributes.description: This week on Let's Roll we are playing Mascarade!  In Mascarade players need to keep track of their role and its abilities to gain 13 coins before anyone else does.  The twist is players are able to swap roles with one another without and claim to have a role they may or may not.  Those who feel confident a player is lying can publicly challenge them to reveal themselves.  How will we fare in this game of memory, deception, and clever bluffing?  Powers:  Judge - Take all of the courthouse's gold  Bishop - Take 2 gold coins from the richest of the other players  King - Receives 3 gold coins  Queen - Receives 2 gold coins  Witch - Swaps their entire fortune with that of another player of their choice  Cheat - Wins the game if they have 10 or more gold coins
attributes.display_title: This Role-Swapping Game Has Us ALL Confused  - Mascarade - Let's Roll

attributes.title: Deception So Deep We’ve Fooled Ourselves! - Mascarade
attributes.caption: We are back with more Mascarade!  This week we replaced the cheat and queen with the fool and the thief.  How will this party go down with two new roles entering the scene and who will come out on top? Powers:  Judge - Take all of the courthouse's gold  Bishop - Take 2 gold coins from the richest of the other players  King - Receives 3 gold coins  Witch - Swaps their entire fortune with that of another player of their choice Fool - Receives a gold coin from the bank and swaps - or not - the cards of two other players  Thief - Takes one gold coin from the player on their left and their right
attributes.description: We are back with more Mascarade!  This week we replaced the cheat and queen with the fool and the thief. attributes.display_title: Deception So Deep We’ve Fooled Ourselves! - Mascarade

attributes.title: Board Game Mukbang - Steam Up
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we're playing Steam Up to celebrate AAPI month!  In Steam Up players aim to create the perfect meal by purchasing steamers full of bao.  Each bao is worth a different amount of points depending on the character.  Each player has a specific character that has unique abilities that they'll use to score as many points as possible.  Who will come out full and who will go home craving more?

attributes.caption: Get ready, adventurers! We're playing Dragon's Gold, a game where we team up to slay dragons, but then have a limited amount of time to decide how to divvy up the treasure...or no one gets any of it! Surely, we'll all agree on everything all the time and never run in to any problems!

attributes.title: This Isn’t Even My FINAL Form - Casting Shadows
attributes.caption: Today on Let's Roll we're playing Casting Shadows.  In Casting Shadows players will collect resources and learn new spells in order to become their shadow form and eventually take out the competition.  By rolling die and moving from tile to tile, these shadow casters will go from cute harmless animals to spell wielding beasts looking to come out on top!

attributes.title: We Draw Our Sleep Paralysis Demons - MonsDRAWsity
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we are playing MonsDRAWsity.  In MonsDRAWsity one player will have to memorize the look of different monsters and then relay those looks to the other players who then have to draw the monster as best they can.  After drawing, players will have the monster revealed and then vote on who they think drew the monster most accurately.  Will we be able to capture the LOOK of each monster?  Or will we be drawing MONSTROSITIES?
attributes.description: This week on Let's Roll we are playing MonsDRAWsity.  In MonsDRAWsity one player will have to memorize the look of different monsters and then relay those looks to the other players who then have to draw the monster as best they can. Or will we be drawing MONSTROSITIES?

attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we're playing Race to the Raft, where players work together to save cats from an island that has caught on fire. Alfredo, Joe, Lindsay, and Barbara must maneuver the raging fire and create a safe path for each cat to the raft!

attributes.title: We're Pirates! In the Caribbean Even - Black Fleet
attributes.caption: Arrgh matey, it's time for a new Let's Roll.  This week on the high seas we are playing Black Fleet.  A game for pirates to loot, shoot, and discover the worlds buried treasures.  Pirates will make their way around the high seas while transporting cargo and stealing cargo from other players in order to cash in for some sweet doubloons.  The first sea captain to earn enough solid gold and raise their sails to the highest point wins and lays claim to the dangerous and unforgiving waters.

attributes.title: The Most Exciting One Hour in Sports! - Long Shot
attributes.caption: This week on Let's Roll we are betting the house on some horses in "Longshot: The Dice Game".  In Longshot, betters will take turns rolling the dice to see which horse gets to move up each round and then placing bets, equipment, or taking concessions on each horse.  Players who bet more on each of the three top horses will make back more money once the race has concluded and the better with the highest amount in the end wins!  Horses:  #1 Chain Reaction: When you complete a vertical column, mark any concession.  #2 Too Lucky: When a 2 is rolled, gain $2.  #3 Scatter Shot:  When the die is rolled, you may mark any concession as if the number rolled one higher or one lower.  #4 Early Bird Special:  Your bet is free when placed on horses you have no bet already on.  #5 Charley Horse: When you complete a horizontal row, move an horse back one.  #6 Miracle Worker:  When bought, mark any concession, jersey, or helmet.  #7 At scoring: Gain $2 for each horse you have a bet on.  #8 Nitro Nellie: When helmeted, move the rolled horse up one space.
attributes.description: This week on Let's Roll we are betting the house on some horses in "Longshot: The Dice Game".  In Longshot, betters will take turns rolling the dice to see which horse gets to move up each round and then placing bets, equipment, or taking concessions on each horse.  Players who bet more on each of the three top horses will make back more money once the race has concluded and the better with the highest amount in the end wins!  Horses:  #1 Chain Reaction: When you complete a vertical column, mark any concession.  #2 Too Lucky: When a 2 is rolled, gain $2.  #3 Scatter Shot:  When the die is rolled, you may mark any concession as if the number rolled one higher or one lower.  #4 Early Bird Special:  Your bet is free when placed on horses you have no bet already on.  #5 Charley Horse: When you complete a horizontal row, move an horse back one.  #6 Miracle Worker:  When bought, mark any concession, jersey, or helmet.  #7 At scoring: Gain $2 for each horse you have a bet on.  #8 Nitro Nellie: When helmeted, move the rolled horse up one space.
attributes.display_title: The Most Exciting One Hour in Sports! - Long Shot

attributes.title: Pokémon Master Trainer THE MOVIE
attributes.caption: For the final Let’s Roll, we try to be the best like no one ever was. Trevor, Michael, Joe, Alfredo, and Matt trek through the Kanto region in order to catch Pokémon, grow stronger, and defeat a gym leader at the Indigo Plateau. Hopefully one of them can do it faster than Ash did, or we might be here for a while..
